item.title: The ring of truth
item.description: Also: Carlyle and Blackstone execs on tariffs, Target and Best Buy warn of price increases, Wall Street is distraught.

item.title: Only 9 states still tax groceries and with egg prices soaring several are trying to leave the club

item.title: Malaysia is buying Arm’s blueprints for $250 million to realize its ambitions to be a ‘non-aligned’ chip player
item.description: Malaysia hopes its Arm deal will help foster 10 local chip companies with annual revenue between $1.5 billion to $2 billion each.
